title: Himi 277
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko e ngaue ‘a Sīsū
Na’e ‘i he Laumālie,
Pea ongo mālie ia,
Ki he loto ‘o e kakai.
2.
Pea na’a ne foaki
Hono Laumãlie lelei,
Ki he’ene kau ākonga,
Ke nau fa’a ngāue’aki.
3.
’Eiki, ke ke lingi hifo,
‘A ho Laumālie lelei,
Hangē ko ho’o folofola,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē.
4.
Pea ongo mālie ai,
‘A ho folofola tupu,
Ki he kakai ‘oku kumi,
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona.
5.
Pea ngāue fai ma’u ai pē,
‘E ho Laumālie lelei,
‘I he loto ‘o ho kakai,
Ke mau fiemālie ai. *
